title: Deluxe King Room
shortDescription: Spacious room with king-size bed and city view.
longDescription: This deluxe king room offers a luxurious experience with a soft king-sized bed, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and an amazing view of the city skyline.

title: Executive Suite
shortDescription: Luxury suite with kitchen and bathtub.
longDescription: Executive Suite includes a fully equipped kitchen, modern bathtub, spacious balcony with a beautiful view, and all premium amenities.

title: Sea View Suite
shortDescription: Enjoy the sea breeze from your private balcony.
longDescription: A top-tier suite with uninterrupted views of the sea, private balcony, luxury bath, king-sized bed, and 24/7 room service.

title: Budget Twin Room
shortDescription: Economical twin room with free breakfast.
longDescription: Perfect for friends or family on a budget. Clean and tidy twin beds, attached bathroom, basic furniture, and complementary breakfast.

title: Luxury Honeymoon Suite
shortDescription: Perfect for couples with jacuzzi and candlelight setup.
longDescription: The honeymoon suite includes a jacuzzi, soft lighting, candlelight dinner setup, romantic decorations, and exclusive couple services.

title: Heritage Room
shortDescription: Classic decor with wood interior, perfect for couples.
longDescription: Heritage Room features vintage wooden furniture, soft lighting, warm ambiance, and a charming stay experience with cultural touch.

title: Premium Twin Room
shortDescription: Two twin beds, AC, minibar, and locker.
longDescription: Ideal for business or family travelers. This room includes two separate beds, air conditioning, a minibar, secure locker, and workspace.

title: Single Room with View
shortDescription: Single bed with lake view and work desk.
longDescription: A small but cozy room with a lakeside view, a clean bathroom, a comfortable single bed, and a desk for working professionals.

title: Single Room with View
shortDescription: Spacious room for 4 with breakfast included.
longDescription: Great for families, this room features 2 double beds, an attached bathroom, breakfast service, and room service on call.

title: Cozy Budget Room
shortDescription: Perfect for solo travelers. Clean and affordable.
longDescription: Simple and neat accommodation best suited for solo or budget-conscious travelers. Includes Wi-Fi, fan, bed, and shared washroom.
